text: Nesslau-Krummenau was a municipality in Toggenburg in the canton of St. Gallen in Switzerland. == History == Nesslau-Krummenau was created on 1 January 2005.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 On 1 January 2013, the municipalities Nesslau-Krummenau and Stein joined together to become the new municipality called Nesslau.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 2 January 2013 == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Category:2005 establishments in Switzerland Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of St. Gallen
title: Nesslau-Krummenau
